poisspatial

The poisspatial R package provides functions for manipulating spatial data.

Installation 

# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("poissonconsulting/poisspatial")

Contribution

Please report any issues.

Pull requests are always welcome.

Code of Conduct

Please note that the poisspatial project is released with a Contributor Code of Conduct. By contributing to this project, you agree to abide by its terms.
